name: Flutter Setlist Creator Dev
postCreateCommand: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y git wget unzip nano libu2f-udev libvulkan1 && wget https://dl.google.com/linux/direct/google-chrome-stable_current_amd64.deb && sudo dpkg -i google-chrome-stable_current_amd64.deb || sudo apt-get -f install -y && rm google-chrome-stable_current_amd64.deb && git clone https://github.com/flutter/flutter.git -b stable /home/codespace/flutter && echo 'export PATH="$PATH:/home/codespace/flutter/bin"' >> ~/.bashrc && source ~/.bashrc
